sprint_goal: Provision all cloud infrastructure as code to enable automated deployments. This is a foundational, parallel track.
Establish the core application foundation, including RBAC and all master data models (Vehicle, Driver, Customer, Route, Material).
Implement the core trip workflow (Create, Assign, Cancel) and vehicle document management. Establish the CI pipeline.
Launch the Driver Portal MVP with login, trip viewing, trip start, and POD upload capabilities. Establish the CD pipeline.
Implement the end-to-end expense submission workflow for drivers and develop the data migration scripts and validation process.
